LABEL: 0xCD
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0xDD
STRING: Is this dream, or reality?

LABEL: 0x16A
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x17A
STRING: The boundaries between the two are blurred, leading to one possibility.

LABEL: 0x213
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x223
STRING: Another future for these women may have bloomed somewhere else.

LABEL: 0x2BE
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x2CE
STRING: There's a fragment of Jasmine here. She wished for the end, and yet still sought a continuation.

LABEL: 0x37F
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x38F
STRING: Let's look into that fragment.

LABEL: 0x5B3
STRING: On a beautiful sunny day, I was at an amusement park with Matsuri.

LABEL: 0x65F
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x66F
STRING: Itarou! Come on, this way, this way! Hurry up before the sun sets!

LABEL: 0x6DD
STRING: It isn't even noon - it's dangerous to be in such a hurry.

LABEL: 0x776
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x786
STRING: Hmmm. You don't understand, Itarou! Time is limited, you know? So it's best to hurry!

LABEL: 0x81A
STRING: Matsuri pulls my arm.

LABEL: 0x864
STRING: Hah... Matsuri is always like this.

LABEL: 0x8B2
STRING: She's always so full of energy.

LABEL: 0x8F6
STRING: What a bright, cheery girl.

LABEL: 0x979
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x989
STRING: Ah, Itarou! Let's go on that roller coaster! Isn't that what people usually do in amusement parks?

LABEL: 0xA56
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0xA66
STRING: ...Hey, what's with that face? You... are scared?

LABEL: 0xB0D
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0xB1D
STRING: Come on, don't be mad, I was just teasing. You're so cute.

LABEL: 0xBCA
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0xBDA
STRING: Don't worry! I'll hold your hand!

LABEL: 0xC5D
STRING: Matsuri had a big smile.

LABEL: 0xCAB
STRING: ...I'm going to be tossed around all day anyway.

LABEL: 0xCF7
STRING: At the very least, I'll go along with this so Matsuri can be happy.

LABEL: 0xE29
STRING: The sun is starting to set.

LABEL: 0xE63
STRING: We're about to head home after spending the day in the amusement park.

LABEL: 0xF0F
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0xF1F
STRING: I had so much fun! That was so exciting!

LABEL: 0xFC4
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0xFD4
STRING: Especially the roller coaster! It was so good. I could ride that forever!

LABEL: 0x1091
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x10A1
STRING: How was it, Itarou? Did you have fun?

LABEL: 0x10F1
STRING: I told her I did.

LABEL: 0x112D
STRING: Matsuri smiled when she heard my answer.

LABEL: 0x117D
STRING: ...She's a really happy girl.

LABEL: 0x11BF
STRING: Matsuri is always smiling.

LABEL: 0x11FF
STRING: She is also so energetic.

LABEL: 0x125F
STRING: But behind that cheerfulness, there's a sense of danger, as if it could break at any moment.

LABEL: 0x12BD
STRING: That's why I can't leave her by herself.

LABEL: 0x134A
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x135A
STRING: ...Hey, Itarou.

LABEL: 0x1401
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x1411
STRING: I had a lot of fun today. I was really happy.

LABEL: 0x146F
STRING: She tells me this in a small, low voice.

LABEL: 0x14BB
STRING: Her red hair and the sunset blend together beautifully.

LABEL: 0x1508
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x1518
STRING: I wanted the person I love to break me. That's all I ever wanted.

LABEL: 0x1588
STRING: Matsuri's cheerfulness is the flip side of her greatest weakness.

LABEL: 0x15D8
STRING: Somehow, I already knew this, so her confession was not a surprise.

LABEL: 0x1640
STRING: It is because I am aware of this that I can't help but think one thing.

LABEL: 0x1696
STRING: I wonder if I can be the one who can satisfy this girl.

LABEL: 0x16EF
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x16FF
STRING: But... I've been having so much fun spending time with you. I thought it would be okay to put it off just a little bit longer.

LABEL: 0x1799
STRING: If I can become such a person, then...

LABEL: 0x17DB
STRING: For Matsuri and I, this could be our happiest possible future.

LABEL: 0x1838
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x1848
STRING: I love you. I love you, Itarou. I really... love you.

LABEL: 0x189D
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x18AD
STRING: So... will you break me? I mean, when I want it to end.

LABEL: 0x1968
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x1978
STRING: Haha! I knew you'd say that!

LABEL: 0x19D4
STRING: It's the end of the sunny day.

LABEL: 0x1A1C
STRING: I will never forget the smile on her face.
